definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: ji4 suan4 ji1 ke1 xue2 jia1

sentences.english: Xiaowen's favourite subject is computer science.
sentences.chinese: 晓文最喜爱的课程是计算机科学。

sentences.english: Zhang Ming graduated from Beijing University of Post and Telecommunications with degree of M. S. in computer science.
sentences.chinese: 张明毕业于北京邮电大学，获得计算机科学硕士学位。

sentences.english: He has a PhD in computer science from Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有斯坦福大学计算机科学博士学位。

sentences.english: Lei graduated from Wuhan University in 1991 with a degree in Computer Science.
sentences.chinese: 于一九九一年，雷先生于武汉大学计算机科学系毕业。

sentences.english: I was in electrical engineering major, because there was no computer science.
sentences.chinese: 专业是电子工程，因为当时没有计算机科学这个专业。
计算机科学相关征稿信息。

sentences.english: Dept. of Automatic Control of Tsinghua University, the former name of Dept. of Computer Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 清华大学自动控制系，计算机科学与技术系前身。

sentences.english: These requirements represent a pretty good cross-section of the CS curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 这些要求表现了计算机科学课程的一个很好的横截面。

sentences.english: Umniah is going to Britain to study computer sciences.
sentences.chinese: 乌尼娅将去英国学习计算机科学。

sentences.english: So, I went down the computer science route.
sentences.chinese: 所以我选择了计算机科学这条路。

sentences.english: And that was when I switched my concentration from computer science to philosophy and psychology.
sentences.chinese: 于是我将研究方向从计算机科学转向了哲学及心理学。

sentences.english: Distributed computing is very important in todays computer science and technology development.
sentences.chinese: 分布式计算是当今计算机科学与技术发展的重要领域。

sentences.english: What kind of impact does computer science have on terminology?
sentences.chinese: 计算机科学对术语学又有什么影响？

sentences.english: The satisfiability problem is a key problem in computer science and artificial intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 这是计算机科学和人工智能中的重要问题之一。

sentences.english: What abstract concept forms the core of computer science?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的抽象概念形成了计算机科学的核心？

pinyin: Ka3 nei4 ji1 Mei2 long2 Da4 xue2
sheng1 wu4 yi1 xue2 gong1 cheng2
